clean_data: Cyber Security Analyst Cyber span lSecurityspan span lAnalystspan Cyber Security Specialist Springfield VA Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Cyber Security Analyst PlanIT Group LLC Washington DC March 2016 to Present Provide Computer Network Defense Infrastructure Support for a Government Agency as an administrator across multiple networks providing tier II and tier III support as needed Assist with the Accreditation of CND appliances by working with SCAs to provide all required documentation for the xacta package Participate with various stages of the system development life cycle to support our suite of CND appliances including malware analysis packet capture netflow analysis and forensics that are essential for the success of the mission Interface with multiple teams in order maintain physical and virtual servers locally and remotely in various regions to provide maximum system availability including ESD Server Computing Network Engineering DBAs and the product vendors themselves for troubleshooting Proactively perform upgrades and patches to hardware and software for CND appliances in order to stay within compliance and reduce system vulnerabilities Responsible for onsite and remote support including installations configuration changes maintenance and functional operations of hardwaresoftware CND appliances Oversee the inventory management of CND appliances Restructured the CND teams documentation process by creating a centralized SharePoint location for all SOPs files and documents in order to enhance the sharing of knowledge between team members Manage user accounts across multiple networks for the CND appliances Freelance IT Consultant Unique U Salon and Day Spa Lorton VA September 2012 to June 2017 Responsible for the installation and configuration of computer hardware software systems backups networks printers and scanners for the needs of a small business Provided troubleshooting both virtually and onsite for issues that impacted day to day operations Overhauled and updated the network for a small business to ensure all devices on the network were fully functional Systems Engineer Lockheed Martin Fort Belvoir VA October 2013 to March 2016 Monitored Geospatial Intelligence Information Management Services GIMS to ensure successful transfer of mission critical data throughout the operational environment Participated in program management meetings to provide feedback and suggestions to leadership for areas of improvement in order to successfully achieve mission goals Executed and analyzed SQL Developer PuTTY and Splunk queries to verify system performance and functionality Interfaced across multiple Information Technology disciplines including Information Systems Programming and Networking to assist with system anomaly detection and to provide immediate resolutions providing 24x7 availability and reliability Team lead in developing and rolling out shared training materials for new employees onboarding into the program Demonstrated excellent written and verbal communication skills by interacting with various support groups customers and users in the Intelligence Community Education Bachelors in Information Technology Cyber Security George Mason University Fairfax VA September 2008 to December 2012 Skills Comptia Cyber Security Information Security Linux Visio Apcon Gigamon Security Analytics Solera Fidelis FireEye RSA Archer BroZeek Snort Suricata Splunk SolarWinds vSphere active Dire WebLogic SQL Developer Service Central Remedy PuTTY Windows Remote Desktop FTK Windows HTML PHP CSS Adobe Excel Inventory Powerpoint MySQL Powerpoint Sharepoint Training Technical Writing Dreamweaver Data Entry forensics CertificationsLicenses CompTIA Security March 2016 to March 2019 Certified Ethical Hacker CEH February 2017 to February 2020 EC Council CompTIA CASP July 2017 to July 2020
